original_title: Retrato de una artista como ser humano
overview: Experimental documentary by the artist, showing various happenings carried out over the years with Marie Louise Alemann and Walther Mejía. As a ritual, the various elements involved in these events are thrown into a river. A film in the form of a personal diary that documents artistic events that took place over a period of time.
title: Retrato de una artista como ser humano
